hero.headline: THE FX-ARM SERIES. KINETIC PERFECTION.
hero.subtext: The benchmark in high-precision manipulation. From the lightweight FX-3 for electronics to the heavy-duty FX-9 for structural assembly, performance is in our DNA.

problem_statement.title: Limitations of Standard Cobots
points: Inadequate payload-to-weight ratios limiting application versatility.
Significant accuracy decay during high-speed operations.
Complex integration processes requiring extensive custom middleware.
Fragility in harsh industrial environments (dust, heat, vibration).

our_solution.title: Unrivaled Versatility. Industrial Strength.
our_solution.description: The FX-Arm is built on a modular aerospace-grade foundation. It features strain-wave gearing and absolute encoders to maintain sub-millimeter precision over millions of cycles.
features: Hyper-Torque Actuators: Highest power density in its class.
Interchangeable Flange System: Quick-swap for vacuum, mechanical, or soft grippers.
Integrated Vision Port: Direct mounting points for FX-Vision sensors.

layers.name: Mechanical Core
layers.details: High-modulus carbon fiber linkages reducing inertia and improving thermal stability.

layers.name: Sensing Mesh
layers.details: Multi-axis force/torque sensors at the tool center point (TCP) for delicate assembly.

layers.name: Control Bus
layers.details: Real-time EtherCAT communication protocol ensuring microsecond synchronization.

benefits_roi.summary: Minimize downtime and maximize precision. The FX-Arm pays for itself through reduced scrap and increased consistency.

case_study.challenge: Drilling 400+ holes in titanium wing spars with varying thickness.
case_study.result: FX-Arm 7-axis manipulator achieved 100% drilling accuracy, reducing secondary inspection time by 60%.

hero.headline: FX-VISION AI. SUPERHUMAN PERCEPTION.
hero.subtext: The eyes of your operation. A deep-learning vision system that goes beyond 2D/3D imaging to provide semantic understanding of complex industrial scenes.

problem_statement.title: The Visual Deficit in Automation
points: Rule-based vision failing under variable lighting or shadows.
Inability to distinguish between similar-looking components in random orientation.
High latency in vision-guided-robotics (VGR) causing jerky movements.
Difficulty in training new models for custom quality inspections.

our_solution.title: Cognitive Vision at the Edge
our_solution.description: FX-Vision AI combines proprietary 4K HDR sensors with a dedicated neural processor. It doesn't just see pixels; it identifies intent, anomalies, and spatial relationships.
features: Neural Bin Picking: Automate the most difficult sorting tasks with ease.
Real-time Defect Mapping: Detect scratches hidden to the human eye in milliseconds.
Autonomous Re-training: Small datasets are all you need to teach the system new parts.

layers.name: Optics Suite
layers.details: Multi-spectral lens array capturing thermal, RGB, and depth data simultaneously.

layers.name: In-Camera AI
layers.details: Dedicated Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) for zero-latency inference.

layers.name: Semantic Engine
layers.details: Spatial-transformer models for 6D pose estimation and collision avoidance.

benefits_roi.summary: Reduce inspection bottlenecks and eliminate human error. FX-Vision AI is your 24/7 quality guard.

case_study.challenge: Identifying microscopic surface blemishes on polished stainless steel.
case_study.result: FX-Vision AI outperformed human inspectors by 4x in speed and 2x in detail detection.

hero.headline: FX-MOBILE SYSTEMS. LOGISTICS UNCONFINED.
hero.subtext: Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) that navigate the most chaotic floors with ease. From warehouse fulfillment to site-to-site heavy transport.

problem_statement.title: Grid-Locked Intralogistics
points: Traditional AGVs requiring expensive magnetic floor tape or fixed reflectors.
Gridlock issues during peak traffic in narrow warehouse aisles.
Difficulty in handling variable payloads and uneven flooring.
Software silos preventing coordination with stationary robotic arms.

our_solution.title: True Autonomy. Swarm Optimized.
our_solution.description: FX-Mobile robots use Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) powered by 3D-LiDAR. They operate as a collective, dynamically re-routing to avoid congestion.
features: Adaptive Swarm Mesh: Robots communicate to clear paths for high-priority loads.
Omni-Directional Drive: Precision movement in any direction, even in tight spaces.
Auto-Docking Power: 24/7 operation with autonomous opportunity charging.

layers.name: Navigation Stack
layers.details: Hybrid-SLAM utilizing LiDAR, IMU, and Vision for centimeter-level localization.

layers.name: Drive System
layers.details: High-torque brushless DC motors with integrated brake-by-wire safety.

layers.name: Payload Interface
layers.details: Universal mounting plate for rollers, lifts, or even FX-Arms for mobile manipulation.

benefits_roi.summary: Unlock the full potential of your facility. Our AMRs require zero infrastructure changes to deploy.

case_study.challenge: A 300% surge in order volume during holiday seasons.
case_study.result: Deployment of a 50-unit FX-Mobile fleet handled the surge without a single safety incident or delay.
